privacy_meta_desc: Learn how OneForMind protects your data, privacy, and ensures your security.
privacy_meta_og_desc: We believe your habits and finances are your own business. Read our privacy policy.
privacy_subtitle: We build tools to help you take control of your life, not to exploit your personal information. Transparency is our default.
privacy_tldr_1_desc: We never sell your personal information or financial data to third parties.
privacy_tldr_2_desc: You own your data. You can export or permanently delete your account at any time.
privacy_tldr_3_desc: Your financial records and habits are encrypted in transit and at rest.
privacy_tldr_4_desc: We only use essential cookies to keep you logged in and functional analytics.
privacy_doc_intro: This Privacy Policy describes how OneForMind ("we", "us", or "our") collects, uses, and shares your personal information when you use our web application, tools, and services.
privacy_p_collection: We believe in data minimization. We only collect what is strictly necessary to make the app work for you.
privacy_li_collection_1_desc: Name, email address, and authentication credentials (if not using Google OAuth).
privacy_li_collection_2_desc: Habit logs, financial entries, journal notes, and planner tasks.
privacy_li_collection_2_strong: This data is strictly private to your account.
privacy_li_collection_3_desc: Basic analytics such as IP address, browser type, and operating system to help us debug errors.
privacy_p_usage: Your data is used exclusively to provide and improve the OneForMind experience. Specifically, we use it to:
privacy_li_usage_1: Provide you with the core functionalities (habit tracking, financial insights, task management).
privacy_li_usage_2: Send you important account notifications (e.g., password resets).
privacy_li_usage_3: Analyze anonymous, aggregated usage patterns to improve our UI/UX.
privacy_finance_note_desc: We are not a bank. We do not connect directly to your bank accounts. All financial data is manually inputted by you and is used solely to generate personal insights.
privacy_p_security: We implement standard industry practices to protect your data. Our databases are secured, and we enforce HTTPS/SSL for all communications. Passwords are securely hashed using modern cryptographic algorithms.
privacy_p_cookies: OneForMind uses "cookies" to remember your session and preferences (like Dark mode). We do not use intrusive third-party advertising trackers on our dashboard.
privacy_p_rights: Depending on your location, you have the right to:
privacy_li_rights_1: Access the personal information we hold about you.
privacy_li_rights_2: Request the correction of inaccurate data.
privacy_li_rights_3: Request the permanent deletion of your account and all associated data.
privacy_p_contact: If you have any questions or data deletion requests, please reach out to us:
privacy_contact_sla: We typically respond within 24-48 business hours.
privacy_export_desc: We don't hold your data hostage. You can download a complete backup of your habits, finances, and journals anytime.
privacy_faq_1_q: Can your team read my private journal entries?
privacy_faq_1_a: No. We have strict internal access controls. Unless you explicitly share an error log with our support team, your user-generated content remains entirely private.
privacy_faq_2_q: Do you sell my data to advertisers?
privacy_faq_2_a: Absolutely not. Our business model is based on providing a great productivity tool, not acting as a data broker.
privacy_faq_3_q: How do I delete my account?
privacy_faq_3_a: You can delete your account permanently directly from your Profile Settings inside the dashboard. This action will wipe all your data from our servers.

pm_meta_og_title: You are not a Corporation. Stop acting like one.
pm_meta_og_desc: Why use enterprise tools for personal life? Get a system built for YOU.
pm_hero_desc: Tools like ClickUp, Monday, or Asana are built for managers to track employees. When you use them alone, you are just micromanaging yourself with expensive bloatware.
pm_cycle_desc: Why treating your life like a JIRA ticket kills your soul.
pm_cycle_1_desc: You set up Trello or ClickUp. You create columns, tags, and assign tasks to yourself. You feel like a boss.
pm_cycle_2_desc: Every task needs a status, priority, and due date. You spend more time managing tickets than doing the actual work.
pm_cycle_3_desc: The notifications pile up. The complex views are overwhelming. You quit and go back to notes.
pm_prob_desc: Gantt charts? Dependencies? Team permissions? You don't need them. These features just add friction between you and your goals.
pm_sol_desc: OneForMind is a Personal OS. No team chats, no 'assignees', no noise. Just a clean space for your habits, finance, and goals.
pm_sol_box_desc:
Why do you need to 'Assign' a task to yourself?
In OneForMind, everything is yours by default.
pm_compare_desc: The difference between managing others and leading yourself.
pm_cta_desc: Stop reporting to a piece of software. Start using a system that empowers you.
habitap_meta_desc: Transform your habits into a lifestyle. OneForMind helps you build a lasting identity beyond just simple streaks.
habitap_meta_og_desc: The habit tracker designed for human growth, not just pixelated rewards.
habitap_hero_desc: Most habit apps feel like a game. OneForMind feels like real growth. Focus on who you are becoming.
habitap_cycle_1_desc: High on numbers and shiny pixel badges.
habitap_cycle_2_desc: Terrified of losing a streak if you miss one day.
habitap_cycle_3_desc: Streak breaks. Motivation dies. You quit.
habitap_prob_desc: Habits should serve you, not pressure you.
habitap_sol_desc: We use the 'Never Miss Twice' rule to keep you consistent.
habitap_sol_1_desc: Focus on the person you want to become.
habitap_sol_2_desc: Connect habits directly to your life goals.
habitap_sol_3_desc: Data that tells a story, not just numbers.
habitap_compare_desc: Don't play with your life. Build it for real.
habitap_cta_desc: Build an identity that lasts longer than a pixelated heart.
hero_desc: A personal operating system that combines every aspect of your life. Focus on what matters today, and forget the mental clutter with OneForMind.
eco_desc: Not just Habits. This is a complete toolkit to manage every aspect of your life in one single dashboard.
eco_habit_desc: The core feature. Build new habits with a daily checklist system. Visualize your streaks to stay motivated.
eco_finance_desc: Simple income & expense tracking. Stop the silent leaks in your wallet.
eco_daily_desc: Just today's To-Do List. Focus on what actually needs to get done right now.
eco_goal_desc: Break down big yearly dreams into reasonable and executable targets.
eco_journal_desc: Pour out your thoughts. Daily reflection to keep your mind sane.
eco_job_desc: Track your job applications (Sent, Interview, Offer) or schedule your social media posts.
prob_1_desc: Too many apps clutter the mind. Scattered tasks, finances, and habits everywhere only become a mental burden for you.
prob_1_point_1: Losing focus due to complicated systems.
prob_1_point_2: Burnout from switching between too many apps.
prob_2_desc: Habits on your phone, finances on your laptop, journal in a notebook. Your energy is drained just trying to remember which app to open.
prob_2_solution: OneForMind combines Habits, Finances, and Planners into one simple Dashboard.
sol_card_1_desc: Hassle-free daily checklists. Track your progress visually. Green means go, gray means skip.
sol_card_2_desc: Input expenses in just 3 seconds. 'Coffee - $2'. Done. See exactly where your money is leaking this month.
sol_card_3_desc: All the features you need, perfectly integrated. Give your mind room to breathe without fragmented apps.
about_desc: An honest story about burnout, red notifications, and the search for sanity in a digital world.
story_1_p1: Our phones used to be filled with productivity apps. Trello for work, Notion for notes, Excel for finances. We thought it made us productive.
story_1_p2: The reality? We became slaves to the apps. We spent more time 'managing' the system than actually getting things done.
story_2_p1: We realized something was wrong. Modern apps force us to run a marathon with no finish line. Miss one task, and rigid systems instantly kill your motivation.
story_2_quote: We need a system that forgives, not one that punishes.
story_2_p2: Finally, we created OneForMind. A calm ecosystem that unites all your productivity needs without the overwhelm.
manifesto_1_desc: Your data is your business. We are not an ad company. We don't sell your habit data to third parties.
manifesto_2_desc: One dashboard for everything. You no longer need to open multiple apps just to log finances, habits, and schedules.
manifesto_3_desc: Anti-bloatware. We only include features you genuinely need to keep your life organized. No tacky gamification.
dev_desc: Built solo out of frustration with complicated habit apps. I coded this to solve my own problems, and hopefully, it helps you too.
user_desc: The first users brave enough to try this system. The ones reporting bugs at 2 AM and pitching crazy feature ideas. You aren't just users; you're Co-Founders.
team_connect: Want to discuss features or just vent about burnout?
cta_about_desc: Time to stop scrolling and start organizing your life. It only takes 2 minutes to set up.
cta_about_sub: No Credit Card Required. Cancel anytime.
cta_final_desc: Don't wait until later to get organized. Start now, regain your focus. Risk-free.
faq_a1: Absolutely. All your data is securely stored in the cloud. You can look back at your finance or habit history anytime for evaluation.
